data.eml:eml: A new species of Chleuastochoerus (Artiodactyla: Suidae) from the Linxia Basin, Gansu Province, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hou, Sukuan, Deng, Tao (2014): A new species of Chleuastochoerus (Artiodactyla: Suidae) from the Linxia Basin, Gansu Province, China. Zootaxa 3872 (5): 401-439, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3872.5.1
